#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#define MAX 100005
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

struct Point{
       int x,y;
       };
Point P[MAX];

int main()
{
    int T;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--){
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
            scanf("%d",&P[i].x);
            }
    
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
            scanf("%d",&P[i].y);
            }
            
            double area=0;
            for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++)
            {
            int x1 = P[i].x - P[0].x;
            int x2 = P[i+1].x - P[0].x;
            int y1 = P[i].y - P[0].y;
            int y2 = P[i+1].y - P[0].y;      
            area += (ll)x1*y2 - (ll)x2*y1;  
            }
            printf("%0.1lf\n",abs(area/2));
            }
 return 0;   
}
